description: Detects a highly relevant Antivirus alert that reports a hack tool or other attack tool
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Arnim Rupp
name: Antivirus Hacktool Detection
query: ((winlog.event_data.Signature:(HTOOL* OR HKTL* OR SecurityTool* OR Adfind* OR ATK\/* OR Exploit.Script.CVE* OR PWS.* OR PWSX*)) OR (winlog.event_data.Signature:(*Hacktool* OR *ATK\/* OR *Potato* OR *Rozena* OR *Sbelt* OR *Seatbelt* OR *SecurityTool* OR *SharpDump* OR *Sliver* OR *Splinter* OR *Swrort* OR *Impacket* OR *Koadic* OR *Lazagne* OR *Metasploit* OR *Meterpreter* OR *MeteTool* OR *Mimikatz* OR *Mpreter* OR *Nighthawk* OR *PentestPowerShell* OR *PowerSploit* OR *PowerSSH* OR *PshlSpy* OR *PSWTool* OR *PWCrack* OR *Brutel* OR *BruteR* OR *Cobalt* OR *COBEACON* OR *Cometer* OR *DumpCreds* OR *FastReverseProxy* OR *PWDump*)))
